column1: Rule 1: Modifiers containing both amino and carboxylic acid groups in a linear chain
column2: Rule 2: Modifiers with a phenyl group directly attached to a carboxylic acid
column3: Rule 6: Modifiers with multiple hydroxyl groups
column4: Rule 7: Modifiers with a pyridine ring combined with activating groups like carboxylic acids
column5: Rule 8: Modifiers with an indole structure
column6: Rule 9: Modifiers with a formyl group
column7: Rule 12: Modifiers with a phenyl group and a sulfanyl group
column8: Rule 13: Modifiers with long aliphatic chains without additional functional groups
column9: Rule 14: Modifiers with a pyridine ring and a phenyl group
